alert.note: Alert for Baker; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HENRY COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN ALABAMA...WESTERN MILLER...SOUTHEASTERN CLAY...SOUTH CENTRAL RANDOLPH...NORTHWESTERN BAKER...WESTERN CALHOUN...EARLY AND NORTHWESTERN SEMINOLE COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA THROUGH 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 240 PM EDT/140 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Donalsonville, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Blakely, Donalsonville, Edison, Arlington, Columbia, Douglasville, Centerville, Damascus, Jakin, Bellville, Haleburg, Bluffton, Saffold, Iveys Mill, Parksville, Hayes, Mayhaw, Rock Hill, and Early Co A/p. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
